hero.subtag: BSc Computer Science — University of Manchester (Year 1, First-Class)

paragraphs: I'm a Year 1 Computer Science student at the University of Manchester (First-Class year 1). I build full-stack web platforms, organise student events, and lead logistics for campus projects. My work spans web apps, real-time systems and user-centred design.

I enjoy turning messy problems into simple, reliable solutions — whether that's a campus RSVP system, a multiplayer game for student nights, an AI gym coach MVP or an ML-backed health tool. I'm organised, collaborative, and always learning.

projects.title: Smart Campus Connect Platform (SCCP)
projects.short: Full-stack campus events platform with real-time RSVP and role-based control.
projects.impact: Pilot onboarded 50+ users; organisers reported significant time savings in attendee management.

projects.title: PromptClash
projects.short: Real-time multiplayer party game used in university game nights.
projects.impact: Handled 100+ concurrent players during campus events; used as a social activity for students.
